mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.reg_date, u.reg_stus, e.ext_id from ext_info e, (select u.user_id, u.user_name, a.reg_date, a.reg_stus, a.ext_id as ext_id from user_info u, app_class a where u.user_id = a.user_id) u where e.ext_id = u.ext_id and e.user_id = #{user_id} and sysdate() < e.str_class_date

mapper.insert: insert into app_class (ext_id, user_id, reg_date, reg_stus) values(#{ext_id}, #{user_id}, now(), "수락대기");
mapper.select: select s.user_id, s.user_name, a.reg_date, a.reg_stus, s.ext_id from app_class a, (select u.user_id, u.user_name, e.ext_id, e.str_class_date from user_info u, ext_info e where u.user_id = e.user_id) s where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.ext_id = s.ext_id and sysdate() < s.str_class_date
